thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: No Value for Money here!
thread.title_full: No Value for Money here! - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Bigboy1959
title: No Value for Money here!
text:
Not a five star property!
Poor value compared to Sheraton or Intercontinental hotels nearby.
Noisey street hotel.
Dull and drab interior.
Construction work from 6am on the building.
Hotel should be closed during reformations!
Atmosphere totally lacking in the bar area.
Breakfast ok but not 5* no quality / finness
Reception have limited authority to resolve complaints effectively.
Requested a quiet room when reserving and was allocated a 1st floor room above reception, immediately opposite elevators!!
Really
Family room at Â£485/night - a joke!
